overview: High school student Jen Guilarman lives in misery with her abusive mother and her mom's lesbian lover.  Looking for some escape, she aims to join an all-girl gang which first requires her to undergo a sexual rite.  Jen only has one man in mind, and that is her teacher Ariel Basco who has always been sympathetic with her.  Suddenly, Jen cries rape and gets her teacher arrested.  But behind her tragic fate is a dark truth.
title: Menor de Edad
